mdRecord.dcterms:title: Readings on the Purgatorio of Dante: chiefly based on the commentary of Benvenuto da Imola / by the Hon. William Warren Vernon. With an introduction by the late Very Rev. Dean of St. Paul's
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Benvenutus de Imola, -1387 or 1388
Vernon, William Warren, 1834-1919
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 2 v. front. (col. port.) plan, diagrs. 20 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: v. 1. Preliminary chapter: Description of Purgatory. Time occupied in passing through Purgatory and supposed date of the vision. The principal divisions of the Purgatorio. Date when the Purgatorio was written. Nature of the Purgatorio as compared with the Inferno. Dante's itinerary through Purgatory. Supplementary list of authors and editions quoted (v. l. p. xlvii-lii) Text, translation, and commentary, canto I-XV.--v. 2. Text, translation, and commentary, canto XVI-XXXIII. Index.
Frontispiece: "Dante by Giotto after a drawing ... by Baron Seymour Kirkup made before the restoration of the fresco in 1841."
One copy: Photocopy. North Manchester, IN : Heckman Bindery, Inc., [2005].
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Dante Alighieri, 1265-1321--Purgatorio
Dante Alighieri, 1265-1321--Commentaries.
Dante Alighieri, 1265-1321--Travel.
